column6:
A DOUBLE-DOSE OF SNIKTING & SMASHING!! The slugfest continues as a new heavy hitter comes a callin', the ultra-sexy Ultimate She-Hulk!!! Who is this mysterious jade giantess and, more importantly, who's she puttin' the hurt on first??!! Damon Lindelof, the co-creator of the hit TV series LOST, and superstar artist Leinil Francis Yu (Secret Invasion) bring you the next two installments of this gut-wrenching, spine-tingling, head-splattering series!,2009,4
Rated T+ ...$2.99
